metadata.inclusion:
1) Put the Z-Wave Controller into inclusion mode

2) Press the Push button one time in door sensor
metadata.exclusion:
1) Put the Z-Wave Controller into exclusion mode

2) Press the Push button three times in door sensor
metadata.reset:
1) Press the Push button for more than 10 seconds

2) Verify that LED is blinking one time

â€» Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
